medical_history.chief_complaint: Abdominal pain and vomiting for several days, accompanied by chills.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began suddenly approximately 1 week ago. Initially, the abdominal pain was diffuse but later localized to the right upper quadrant (RUQ) and epigastrum. The patient experienced vomiting for several days.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Lung cancer (remission), breast cancer (remission), diverticulitis, right lumpectomy for breast cancer with right axillary dissection and radiation, right lower lobe (RLL) lobectomy for lung cancer.
medical_history.family_history: Her mother had tuberculosis many years ago.
